sentences.sContent: With John here, you never know what will happen next.
sentences.sCn: 有约翰在这里，你永远都不会知道接下来会发生什么事。

sentences.sContent: Next, put it in the oven for 20 minutes.
sentences.sCn: 然后把它放到烤箱里烤20分钟。

sentences.sContent: I'll be 26 years old next Friday.

synos.tran: 下一个的；其次的；贴近的

phrases.pCn: [美国俚语]博得某人欢心；(尤指在性关系上)与某人相契，熟识某人

trans.tranCn: 最近的；紧挨着的，隔壁的；下一次

trans.tranOther: the next person or thing in a list, series etc comes after the one that you are dealing with now
